title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4ยง 3.4 - Ineligibility of promotion candidates for simultaneous open competitive examination
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4ยง 3.4 - Ineligibility of promotion candidates for simultaneous open competitive examination

State Regulations

An employee who is a candidate in a promotion examination for
a title unique to an agency or is a candidate in an interdepartmental promotion
examination shall not be eligible to enter additionally an open competitive
examination held at the same time for the same title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4ยง
3.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
